verbose_text: The FANCD2 / FANCI complex is recruited to the lesion through its DNA binding capacity, but this is also promoted through its interactions with UHRF1, UHRF2, and some components of the FA core complex, mainly the E3 ligase FANCL, which together with the E2 conjugating enzyme FANCT or UBE2T monoubiquitinates FANCD2 and FANCI.
evidence: FANCL, which together with the E2 conjugating enzyme FANCT or UBE2T monoubiquitinates FANCD2
